parameter.label: 2: Basic Set Level
parameter.description: -1 -> 0xFF(-1) turns on the light. 1 - 100 -> For dimmers 1 to 100 means the light strength

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: PIR Sensitivity
parameter.description: parameter to set the Sensitivity for the PIR (Passiv Infrared Sensor) 0 -> 0 means disable the PIR motion; 1 - 99 -> 1 means the lowest sensitivity, 99 means the highest sensitivity

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Light Threshold
parameter.description: Setting the illumination threshold to turn on the light. When the event triggered and the environment illumination lower then the threshold, the device will turn on the light 0 -> 0 means turn off illumination detected function And never turn on the

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Operation Mode
parameter.description: Bit 0: 1 means security mode; 0 means home automation mode. Bit 1: 1 means enable test mode; 0 means disable test mode. Notice: Bit0 and Bit1 will effect when the DIP Switch setting to program mode. If Bit1 is enabled, the Bit0 is useless. Bit 2: Disable

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Multi-Sensor Function Switch
parameter.description: Bit 0: Disable magnetic integrate illumination. Bit 1: Disable PIR integrate Illumination. Bit 2: Disable magnetic integrate PIR (Default is Disable) Bit 3: When Bit2 is 0 (Enable), the device is install in the same room with the light? 0: In the same roo

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: PIR Re-Detect Interval Time
parameter.description: In the security mode, after the PIR motion detected, setting the re-detect time 3 8 sec - 127 8 sec -> 8 seconds per tick, and minimum time is 24 seconds, default tick is 3 (24 seconds).

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Turn Off Light Time
parameter.description: After turn on the light, setting the delay time to turn off the light when the PIR motion is not detected 4 8 sec - 127 8 sec -> 8 seconds per tick, and minimum time is 32 seconds, default tick is 4 (32 seconds)

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Auto Report Battery Time
parameter.description: interval time for auto report the battery level 1 30 min - 127 30 min -> 30 minutes per tick and minimum time is 30 minutes, default tick is 12 (6 hours)

parameter.name: config_12_1
parameter.label: 12: Auto Report Illumination Time
parameter.description: interval time for auto report the illumination state 1 30 min - 127 30 min -> 30 minutes per tick and minimum time is 30 minutes, default tick is 12 (6 hours)

parameter.name: config_13_1
parameter.label: 13: Auto Report Temperature Time
parameter.description: Interval time for auto report the temperature state 1 30 min - 127 30 min -> 30 minutes per tick and minimum time is 30 minutes, default tick is 12 (6 hours)
